professional_summary: IT Specialist II with expertise in cybersecurity, network security, policy compliance, project management, and performing vulnerability scanning and threat assessments. Skilled in using tools such as IDS/IPS (OSSIM, IPOST), Kali, Parrot, SELinux, RedHat, CentOS, Metasploit Console, etc.

key_responsibilities: Supervisor of Portland Card Office and responsible for all HR functions for 6 administrative specialists.
Identity and access management (IAM) for students
Created lean manufacturing project team and managed backend database systems connected to ERP and CRM business applications.
Generated daily reports using SQL queries and managed vendors for all information systems.
Managed HRIS system and performed employee training.
Monitored government facility systems via IDS system and used patch management tools to remotely monitor and update workstations and network devices.
Performed vulnerability and threat assessments following NIST framework guidelines.
Encrypted communication channels and data drives.
